mapper.insert: insert into bm_review(order_num, store_id, review_content, user_id, score, review_img) values(${orderNum}, #{storeId}, #{reviewContent},#{userId},#{score},#{reviewImg})
mapper.select: select r.order_num, r.store_id, r.review_content, r.boss_comment, r.regi_date, r.score, r.review_img, r.user_id, u.nickname from bm_review r left join bm_user u on r.user_id = u.id where r.store_id = #{id} order by regi_date DESC
